amendment.description: Expressing the sense of the Senate regarding country of origin labeling requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2078 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2078 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 58. Record Vote Number: 443.

Amendment SA 2078 proposed by Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S1418-14128, S14139-14140, S14141-14142; text: CR S14118) Expressing the sense of the Senate regarding country of origin labeling requirements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2078 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2078 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 58. Record Vote Number: 443.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2078 proposed by Senator Daschle.
